name: Power Factory
description:
Playing in the browser? Try fullscreen!

Play as the last robot awake after a massive storm.

Made in ~ 20 hours for the Alberta Game Jam (#abgamejam2020).

Created by Quan "befos7" Lemp, and  Angelo "AngeloDevAB" Encarnacion.

Additional credits can be found in the main menu and end screen.

Power Factory is a simple puzzle platformer that you can play in 5 - 20 minutes.

Controls:

Left and Right Movement
A = Left, D = Right
Control Lift (When above)
W = Up, S = Down
Interact (Batteries, battery holders)
W = Interact

Pause Menu
Escape = Toggle Pause Menu
